name: 徐正會
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Mechanisms; Design Process and Creative Design
2. Moon Festival Holiday
3. Mechanical Members and Joints
4. Engineering Creativity and its Characteristics
5. National Day Holiday
6. Atlas of Kinematic Chains; Kinematic Matrices
7. Specializing Algorithm and Specialized Chains
8. Generalizing Principles and Rules
9. Mid-term Exam.
10. Case Study: Motorcross Suspension Mecahnisms
11. Linkage Transformation and Types of Motion
12. Synthesis of Function Generators (Graphical Methods)
13. Synthesis of Path Generators (Graphical Methods)
14. Synthesis of Motion Generators (Graphical Methods)
15. Geneva Mechanisms and Straight-line Mechanisms
16. Case Study: Clamping Devices
17. Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam. 25%,
Final Exam. 25%,
Homeworks 20%,
Quizzes 15%,
Projects 15%
materials: “Kinematics and Dynamics of Machinery” by Norton(東華，新月); “Kinematics, Dynamics, and Design of Machinery” by Waldron(歐亞)
